content.raw:
* [Xenial GPU](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/485/testReport/) ok
* [Windows](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2126/) ok
* [Homebrew](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1384/) is building
* [Xenial no GPU](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/788/console) failed twice with the error `cgroups: cannot found cgroup mount destination: unknown`, it looks like there is a problem on the Jenkins machine?
content.html:
• Xenial GPU ok
  • Windows ok
  • Homebrew is building
  • Xenial no GPU failed twice with the error cgroups: cannot found cgroup mount destination: unknown, it looks like there is a problem on the Jenkins machine?
